resources.string: Use the left-bottom menu button to add a column
Please set your access token from the account setting.
Set up an account to post a toot.
The file is bigger than the limit of %1$dMB.
Boost this status from %1$s for all followers and viewers of your profile page to see?
Favourite this status from %1$s, and send notification to its author?
Remove account along with all columns?
Go to column list when pressing \"Back\"
No account set up. Add one.
Swipe to delete. Long press to sort. Reload to apply changes.
You can\'t switch accounts when there is an unsent attachment.
Could not follow the non-public user
You need to clarify your reason for reporting
Please take the time to review the app.
prior local URL when open attachment
Turn off fast scrolling (app restart required)
You can\'t close this column (check column settings).
Swipe leftwards to delete. Reload to show statuses published by unmuted apps.
Pseudo account (non-login, only reads public data)
Exit app when trying to close protected column with \"Back\" button without confirmation
Nickname and colour (if specified, it\'s shown instead of full acct)
Reload column to show new nickname/colour.
Show \"Follow\" button in button bar (app restart required)
Send follow request from %2$s to the locked user %1$s?
seems the follow request can\'t be removed by its sender…
Send non-public toot containing hashtags, (which are not normally searchable in public messages)?
Turn off auto-refresh when returning to the app.
Keep the screen on when using the app.
You can\'t close the column using the \"Back\" button with multiple columns visible.
Turn off tablet mode (app restart required)
Minimum column width (default=300 dp), (app restart required)
Media thumbnail height (default=64 dp), (app restart required)
Which account do you quoted renote from?
Thanks to フタバ for the app icon.

Android 7.0 can only use the elliptic curve \"prime256v1\", which your instance doesn\t support.\nUpgrade to Android 7.1.1 or later, or add support for elliptic curve \"prime256v1\" on your instance.\nSee https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=224438
The account used to make this draft has been removed from the app. The following context can not be restored: in_reply_to, media attachment.
The reply origin referred by the draft has been lost. The following context is removed: in_reply_to
Some of the media attachments in the draft have been lost.

You can export data to any app that can receive data, but maybe you can import data only from device storage or from a cloud service.
The column background image can not be exported/imported from device to device.
The timeline font is not exported/imported.
Custom notification sounds can not be exported/imported from device to device.
Don\'t crop media thumbnail (app restart required)
There is also an account setting to turn notifications off/on.
Could not switch account. Old draft data has no in_reply_to_url, can\'t convert in_reply_to for selected instance.
Prioritise Google Chrome (\"Custom Tabs\" is turned on)
Show button bar at the top of tooting screen
Client name (access token needs to be set)
Timeline font size Unit: sp. Leave empty for default (app restart required)
Acct font size Unit: sp. leave empty for default (app restart required)
Search function now unavailable on pseudo account.
Mute more notifications for this conversation
Unmute more notifications for this conversation
Access token (if using Misskey, please input API token)
Format of \"Quote name\" (set text that contains %1$s)
(sample)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Enable GIF animation. (Wastes a lot of battery.)
Show mention as full acct (column reload required)
Info on remote profile pages may not be displayed accurately. Press to view profile in web browser.
This setting is used to adjust notification for %1$s
Notification style (pre Android 8. If running anything later, please check the account settings)
Disable IME Action button when using \"Quick Toot\" bar (app restart required)
Auto hide long text by setting \"Line counts\" greater than 0 (app restart required)
Enquete choice %1$d too long. Remove %2$d character(s).
Enquete choice %1$d is a duplicate of another.
Short acct for local user (app restart required)
If on a destructed instance, please remove the account on that server.
Can\'t get visibility setting in web app.
The MIME type %1$s was not one of the accepted: image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, video/webm or video/mp4.
Turn off custom Emoji animation (app restart and column reload required)
Allow non-space character before emoji shortcode affecting visibility and post. Emojis converted when posting can\'t be restored to shortcode. (app restart and column reload required).
Attachment description can\'t be edited while uploading.
Hide boosts from this user from your home screen
Show boosts from this user from your home screen
please input name of new list.
this instance does not support lists.
Try to follow and add %1$s to list?
Can\'t add user to list:\nPlease retry 2,3 times. Or if user is \"Locked\", please wait until for approval of follow request.
Can\'t add user to list:\nRequest declined.
Media attachment (image) size limit. Unit: MB. The default is 8)
Media attachment (movie) size limit. Unit: MB. The default is 40)
Cannot open \"%1$s\". Try to open it in a web browser.
Try to open the \"%1$s\" media attachment in a web browser.
Can\'t download the same URL twice in a few seconds.
Swipe leftwards to delete. You may need reload the column to check whether it is set.
Can\'t use domain block from pseudo account.
Can\'t use domain block for local instance.
Force adding gap when refreshing top
Avatar icon size. Unit: dp. default: 48 (app restart required)
Avatar icon round ratio. Unit: %. default:33 (app restart required)
Don\'t round avatar icon corners (app restart required)
Not chosen when tapping system notification
The account is from another instance. Send an anonymised copy of the report there as well?
Append attachment URL to contextual text
Turn off fav/BT notifications from this user
Turn on fav/BT notifications from this user
Pull notification check interval (Unit: minutes, default:15, min:15)
Boost private status from %1$s? (Shown to all followers.)
You can\'t boost a private toot by another person.
Instance version %1$s outdated, no supportfor push subscriptions.
Can\'t prepare FCM device ID. Please try again later.
Can\'t prepare install ID. Please try again later.
Due to exporting app data or restoring from backup, this access token may be used by more than one app, and thus needs to be updated to work.
The instance has no push subscription API.
Your access token does not contains push scope. Update it.
Not following anyone, or hidden by setting.
No followers, or hidden by setting.
Hiding social graphs means only you can see them.
If the remote user chooses to hide the social graph, only the followings/followers on this instance will be displayed.
The numbers indicate \'daily(weekly)\'. Daily numbers are reset at %1$s.
Can\'t change account while using redraft.
Delete base status before posting, losing all favouritisations and boosts, disconnecting all replies, and deleting media attachments from Mastodon (pre-2.4.1)?
Notification TL font size. Unit: sp. Leave empty for default. (App restart required)
Notification TL icon size. Unit: dp. Default: 32. (App restart required)
The filter \'%1$s\' will be deleted. Are you sure?
Irreversible. Drop instead of hide. Filtered toots are lost forever, even if the filter is removed later.
The whole word. Recommended to enable only phrases consisting of alphanumeric characters.
Scroll to top when tapping visible column in column strip
Remove the user \"%1$s\" from follow suggestion?
Default text when composing toot. (Does not affect quick toot bar, nor switching account in toot composition screen)
No account available for this purpose.
In Misskey, only direct replies to target note are enumerated. Not all descendants can be displayed.
This Misskey instance does not provide an app secret in response to the /API/app/create API. Please tell the instance owner to update the Misskey service version.
Boost button size. Unit:dp, default=40, (app restart required)
Timeout for embedded media viewer. Unit:seconds, (App restart required)
Missing closeable column in visible range.
Don\'t use (Chrome/Firefox) \"Custom Tabs\" when opening links
\"Timeline around the specified time\" feature has a limitation for the instances pre 2.6.0. It is impossible to get a farther timeline.
Max. character count for preview card description
Boost button alpha opacity Unit:%. Also affected by content text alpha. (App restart required)
This instance (Pleroma?) does not support the push subscription API.
